section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The role of the Financial Markets Law Committee is to identify issues of legal uncertainty or misunderstanding, present and future, in the framework of the wholesale financial markets which might give rise to material risks and to consider how such issues should be addressed.
relevant_communication: Letters, discussion papers, seminars and roundtable discussions.  See www.fmlc.org/publications for a list of publications
legal_status: registered charity and company limited by guarantee
